meanings.sent1: The tall building had many storeys.
meanings.sent2: The apartment building has ten storeys.
meanings.sent3: I got lost on the storey with the funny-shaped windows.
meanings.sent4: Each storey of the tower seemed to touch the sky.
meanings.sent5: The storeys of the hotel were like giant steps reaching upwards.

meanings.sent1: She storeys tales of adventure to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He storeys the legend of the lost city with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as he storeyed a tale with a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: She storeys her memories as if painting a vivid picture.
meanings.sent5: He storeys his dreams in a way that captivates his audience.
